d.name: v6.0.0
d.body:
## What's Changed
* Include platform, arch, and libc in module path by @johanholmerin in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/1002
* Remove node-pre-gyp, use prebuildify by @thom-nic in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/890
* Add string encoding to README by @veigaribo in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/1009
* Fix redefine variable in async_compare.js by @asportnoy in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/1045
* fix/typo-overridden-word by @nikhilnishadoo7 in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/1043
* fix:typo error in comments in bcrypt.js file by @alokranjan609 in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/1036
* update libs for security reasons by @tbo47 in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/1049
* Prepare for v6 by @recrsn in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/1186

## New Contributors
* @johanholmerin made their first contribution in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/1002
* @thom-nic made their first contribution in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/890
* @veigaribo made their first contribution in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/1009
* @asportnoy made their first contribution in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/1045
* @nikhilnishadoo7 made their first contribution in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/1043
* @alokranjan609 made their first contribution in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/1036
* @tbo47 made their first contribution in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/1049

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/compare/v5.1.1...v6.0.0

d.name: v5.1.1
d.body:
## What's Changed
* Refactored example with async await by @lpizzinidev in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/894
* Fixed z/OS build issue by @laijonathan in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/968
* Update dependencies by @recrsn in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/993

## New Contributors
* @lpizzinidev made their first contribution in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/894
* @laijonathan made their first contribution in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/968

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/compare/v5.1.0...v5.1.1

d.name: v5.1.0
d.body:
## What's Changed
* Update node-pre-gyp to 1.0.2 by @feuxfollets1013 in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/865
* Update README for inclusion of musl by @arbourd in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/883
* Version bump, security updates to sub dep npmlog by @adaniels-parabol in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/905
* document ESM usage (#892) by @mariusa in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/899
* fix: update travis CI Docker image repository by @cokia in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/930
* Update node versions in appveyor test matrix by @p-kuen in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/936
* chore(appveyor): not use latest npm by @cokia in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/932
* chore: update Appveyor readme badge by @cokia in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/933
* Use Github actions for CI by @recrsn in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/858
* Update dependencies by @recrsn in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/953
* Migrate tests to use Jest by @recrsn in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/958
* Pin NAPI to v3 by @recrsn in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/959

## New Contributors
* @feuxfollets1013 made their first contribution in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/865
* @arbourd made their first contribution in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/883
* @adaniels-parabol made their first contribution in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/905
* @mariusa made their first contribution in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/899
* @cokia made their first contribution in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/930
* @p-kuen made their first contribution in https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/pull/936

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kelektiv/node.bcrypt.js/compare/v5.0.1...v5.1.0

d.name: v5.0.0
d.body:
- Fix the bcrypt "wrap-around" bug. It affects passwords with lengths >= 255.
  It is uncommon but it's a bug nevertheless. Previous attempts to fix the bug
  was unsuccessful.
- Experimental support for z/OS
- Fix a bug related to NUL in password input
- Update `node-pre-gyp` to 0.15.0
